name: first steps with the mitos wsi ccmct data set
full_name: h2 First steps with the MITOS WSI CCMCT data set
description: Note that we did not check for the class in this code. generate big image crop big image Get the annotation coordinates offset by the left upper coordinate location NOTE We would actually have to check the label class which we omit for the sake of simplicity here. First steps with the MITOS WSI CCMCT data setIn this short tutorial you will see how to use the database and the DICOM images of this data set. Any results you write to the current directory are saved as output. Et voila here we have found two annotated cells in this case mitotic figures.
script: pydicom.encaps numpy get_tile get_id dimensions __init__ decode_data_sequence PIL imagePos_to_id ImageDraw ReadableDicomDataset() read_region Image
